titleStmt.title: Clavis aurea; or, a golden key: by which hidden and mystical scriptures are opened and explained Wherein is clearly discovered and asserted, the doctrine of the salvation of all men. Also the mystery of iniquity laid open, and the doctrine of freewill fully refuted; by proving, that sin is an infirmity. By Thomas Moor.
titleStmt.author: Moor, Thomas, fl. 1695-1697.

notesStmt.note: The mystery of iniquity laid open has a separate dated title page and separate register; pagination is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London.
